descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Welcome to PatchWorld** – where imagination meets innovation! Build immersive worlds, jam with friends worldwide, and remix music/visuals in real-time.

**What is PatchWorld?** - 
A creative platform blending music, visual art, and interactive design. Create, share, and remix  with the community!

**For Everyone:** Musicians, visual artists, performers, educators, and creative explorers.

**Key Features:**
- **Community Hub** – Discover worlds and connect
- **Weekly Events** – Live jams and showcases
- **Modular No-Code System** – Build complex worlds without programming
- **Real-Time Multiplayer** – Collaborate live with creators globally
- **Ultimate Studio** – Unlimited instruments, effects, visuals
- **Ghost Recordings** - Record your avatar performance and interactions.
- **Midi over network, OSC and Ableton Live Integration** – Cross-reality production
- **AI-Powered Creation** – Generate sounds, 3D models, 360° skyboxes
- **Hand Tracking** – Natural VR interaction
- **Ready Player Me Avatars** – Custom characters


**Learn More:** Visit our wiki at wiki.patchxr.io for detailed information.
Join the creative revolution today!
[media]
[media]
